subject: Running remote tests
msgSnippet: I m trying to extend JUnit to support Acceptence testing and I need to run each test (including setUp() and tearDown()) in its own JVM. Has anyone done this?
messageBody:
I'm trying to extend JUnit to support Acceptence testing and I need to run
each test (including setUp() and tearDown()) in its own JVM. Has anyone done
this?

****************************************************************************
